discussion.p: Paragraph 1 in "Effects", says "Calls p->release()" where it clearly must be "Calls p.release()". (As it is, it seems to require using auto_ptr<>::operator-> to refer to X::release, assuming that exists.)

resolution.p: Change paragraph 1 Effects from "Calls p->release()" to "Calls p.release()".

rationale.p: Not a defect: the proposed change is already found in the standard. [Originally classified as a defect, later reclassified.]
